comments:
3.1 M4

1. open pkg explorer and select a working set.
2. run "edit active working set" from the pkg explorer view menu.
3. select another project to include in the active working set.
4. selection finish.

The dialog doesn't close and the pkg explorer doesn't update. If you cancel the
dialog, turn off the working set filter and re-enable the edited working set is
applied. It's although the working set was modified in the dialog, but a
listener crashed (probably the pkg explorer).

Jean-Michel, 

I can't reproduce this neither using M4 nor M4 + latest JDT from HEAD. Do you
have more steps to reproduce or can you provide the details from the log.

Dirk, this happens all the time for me with M4. Note that I was editing a
resource working set and not a java working set.

Problem seems to be an unregistered listener.
